basics.name: Lyor (Leo) Itzhaki
basics.headline: Senior Product Manager | AI, Automation & CRM Platforms

summary.name: Professional Summary
summary.content: Data-driven Product Manager with 5+ years of experience defining product strategy for AI, automation, and technical products. Expert at translating ambiguous problem spaces into clear roadmaps, exemplified by prototyping an LLM-based automation system at EcoCart. Possesses deep domain knowledge in the customer experience space, having built a D2C customer support function from the ground up at TrueML, making an impact by improving key metrics like CSAT and response time.

items.summary:
Owned the core product for a B2C fintech platform, leading strategy and execution for features impacting millions of users, with a focus on data-driven optimization and automation.

  • Partnered with Data Science to refine ML-driven user segmentation, leveraging behavioral data to automate plan selection and boost overall user engagement by 34%.

  • Drove a ~$3-5M annualized revenue uplift by leading cross-functional optimization (Eng, Data Science, Design, CS) and scaling A/B testing to over 30 tests per quarter.

  • Acted as key liaison across teams to deliver a mobile-first redesign of the core repayment flow, simplifying UX and contributing to a 19% lift in completed payments.

Owned the discovery and strategy for a new B2B product line, engaging directly with customers to define an MVP and prototyping AI-powered automation solutions.

  • Prototyped an LLM-driven claims triage system to automate and streamline a core customer support workflow, demonstrating a potential 40% reduction in manual review.

  • Championed customer insights by conducting over 10 merchant interviews and analyzing data to define a new revenue pillar and product roadmap from an ambiguous problem space.

  • Measured success by customer impact, launching a pilot that secured 24% adoption and lifted average merchant NPS from ~35 to ~65.

Established the customer experience and support function from scratch, building the systems, automations, and data infrastructure to serve a growing user base.

  • Built the D2C customer support function from 0, implementing foundational processes, SLAs, and automations that reduced first response time to <4 hours while maintaining a 4.6/5 CSAT.

  • Developed and executed targeted HubSpot email and Twilio SMS campaigns, creating automated user journeys that drove a 25% increase in Monthly Active Users (MAU).

  • Spearheaded the creation of BI dashboards (Looker) to provide real-time visibility into customer support KPIs, enabling data-driven decisions that reduced agent handle time by 12%.

Founded an early-stage micro-agency, delivering AI-powered, production-ready MVPs with integrated automation for non-technical founders.

  • Developed a rapid delivery playbook leveraging reusable components and AI automation patterns to accelerate functional MVP builds from weeks to days.

  • Spearheaded market validation via 25+ founder discovery calls, defining core service offerings focused on AI-driven solutions and workflow automation.

Founding PM partnering directly with founders on 0->1 products. Led discovery, scoping, and delivery from concept to launch.

  • ProgForce: Designed and rapidly prototyped an internal gamified platform for quarterly travel forecasting; UX-tested mechanics that drove participation 40% → 70% in prototype testing.

  • AssemblyDrop: Scoped and defined the MVP for an on-demand contractor marketplace, then piloted the platform, enrolling 5 pilot crews and onboarding 1,000+ SKUs.

items.name: DebtCat (Founder/Builder)
items.description: Independently developed and launched an AI-powered fintech platform featuring an educational chatbot and automated dispute letter generation workflow, simplifying a complex consumer rights process.

items.name: FindMe.pet (Founder/Builder)
items.description: Launched an AI pet adoption matching platform (Next.js, OpenAI API) that automates the analysis of lifestyle compatibility to reduce shelter return rates and improve customer experience.
